CustomField.formula: TEXT ( YEAR( CreditStartDate__c) ) +"-"+ IF(MONTH(CreditStartDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(CreditStartDate__c)), TEXT(MONTH(CreditStartDate__c)) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(CreditStartDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(CreditStartDate__c)), TEXT(DAY(CreditStartDate__c)) ) + " ~ " + TEXT ( YEAR( CreditEndDate__c) )+"-" + IF(MONTH(CreditEndDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(CreditEndDate__c)), TEXT(MONTH(CreditEndDate__c)) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(CreditEndDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(CreditEndDate__c)), TEXT(DAY(CreditEndDate__c)) )
CustomField.label: Credit Start Period
